00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00053     public sealed class CauchyLorentzDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00054     {
00055         double _location;
00056         double _scale;
00057 
00058         #region Construction
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063         public
00064         CauchyLorentzDistribution()
00065             : base()
00066         {
00067             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00068         }
00069 
00078         public
00079         CauchyLorentzDistribution(
00080             RandomSource random
00081             )
00082             : base(random)
00083         {
00084             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00085         }
00086 
00091         public
00092         CauchyLorentzDistribution(
00093             double location,
00094             double scale
00095             )
00096             : base()
00097         {
00098             SetDistributionParameters(location, scale);
00099         }
00100         #endregion
00101 
00102         #region Distribution Parameters
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106         public double Location
00107         {
00108             get { return _location; }
00109             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _scale); }
00110         }
00111 
00115         public double Scale
00116         {
00117             get { return _scale; }
00118             set { SetDistributionParameters(_location, value); }
00119         }
00120 
00124         public
00125         void
00126         SetDistributionParameters(
00127             double location,
00128             double scale
00129             )
00130         {
00131             if(!IsValidParameterSet(location, scale))
00132             {
00133                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00134             }
00135 
00136             _location = location;
00137             _scale = scale;
00138         }
00139 
00146         public static
00147         bool
00148         IsValidParameterSet(
00149             double location,
00150             double scale
00151             )
00152         {
00153             return scale > 0;
00154         }
00155         #endregion
00156 
00157         #region Distribution Properties
00158 
00159 
00160 
00161         public override double Minimum
00162         {
00163             get { return double.MinValue; }
00164         }
00165 
00169         public override double Maximum
00170         {
00171             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00172         }
00173 
00180         public override double Mean
00181         {
00182             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00183         }
00184 
00188         public override double Median
00189         {
00190             get { return _location; }
00191         }
00192 
00199         public override double Variance
00200         {
00201             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00202         }
00203 
00210         public override double Skewness
00211         {
00212             get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }
00213         }
00214 
00218         public override
00219         double
00220         ProbabilityDensity(
00221             double x
00222             )
00223         {
00224             double a = (x - _location) / _scale;
00225             return 1.0 / (Constants.Pi * _scale * (1.0 + a * a));
00226         }
00227 
00231         public override
00232         double
00233         CumulativeDistribution(
00234             double x
00235             )
00236         {
00237             return Constants.InvPi * Trig.InverseTangent((x - _location) / _scale) + 0.5;
00238         }
00239         #endregion
00240 
00241         #region Generator
00242 
00243 
00244 
00245 
00246         public override
00247         double 
00248         NextDouble()
00249         {
00250             return _location + _scale * Trig.Tangent(Constants.Pi * (this.RandomSource.NextDouble() - 0.5));
00251         }
00252         #endregion
00253     }
00254 }
